A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a decent movie. Lots of forced humor...in some parts I liked that bit and in others\, not so much. Slow to start and has a few flaws. However\, I think people are overreacting with their negative comments. People will always have this image of the 3 original Star Wars movies in their head and nothing will EVER compare. I get that. So with that being said\, the new movies will never be comparable to the original but they are good movies in their own right. This wasn't a terrible movie. If I had to rate it on a 1-10 scale (10 being the best) I would give it a 6.5 or 7. My overall judgment would be to dial back the forced humor (we really don't need to laugh that much\, this isn't a comedy...it is Star Wars) but the storyline was good. This movie falls short of Rogue One and The Force Awakens but it is worth the watch! I still love Star Wars and will always be a fan.
